title: PBE Signup Not Working
body:
So, whenever I click on the signup for PBE, it waits awhile, then goes to the iBlitzcrank page that says, exactly this:

"Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong."

and I really want to signup for it, but I'm not able to?
Someone please help. 

I live in NA, so the "your region doesn't allow this" doesnt make sense.

replies.body:
There are a number of ways this link can end up throwing this error. Accessing the page with the following steps may resolve this:

1. [Clear your Browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to ensure any cookies or saved files from the page aren't causing this issue.

2. Log in to your account from the [NA Landing Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/).

3. Visit the PBE Signup page from [this specific link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this worked!
So, I tried all of these, and they all just send me to the same place, and I cleared everything in my Browser cache as well, but that didn't help..

Gotcha. It must be an issue in your route then. No matter! You should be able to work around this by using a VPN (Virtual Private Network) such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) to reroute your connection to that page.

Let me know if this worked for you.
I think Cyberghost worked for it! I don't know if it actually did, though..but it did allow me to go to the site and press the signup, and go to the "Your Application Has Been Sent"

Yup, that means it worked. Awesome to hear! Well, I wish you luck with your application and encourage you to read through our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) if you have any questions about the system at all.

If you have any questions, let me know.
